d:testDescription.p: The test has an optional subtest that indicates whether SVGElementInstance.firstChild and SVGElementInstance.childNodes.item(0) are strictly equal. The status of this subtest is displayed by a circle in the middle of the testframe, it will be yellow if the objects are not strictly equal, and green if they are.

d:operatorScript.p: Run the test. No interaction required.

d:passCriteria.p: The test is passed if there is a green rect visible, and there is a yellow or dark green circle in the middle. If there's any red visible the test has failed.
